scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
scripts.imagemin: imagemin images/* -o dist/images && imagemin images/batch/* -o dist/images/batch && imagemin images/csv/* -o dist/images/csv && imagemin images/jager/* -o dist/images/jager && imagemin images/queerly/* -o dist/images/queerly
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin batch3.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/batch3.html && usemin geofences1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/geofences1.html && usemin jager2.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/jager2.html && usemin queerly-health4.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/queerly-health4.html
